description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada (AAFC) requires architectural consulting services to review a decade old needs study and determine the best course of action for today and beyond for the Charlottetown Research and Development Center (CRDC). This is a request for proposals (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA) E0225-152290 for Mechanical Engineering Services. The invited firms for the province of PEI are: ,

**Tender Description**
-------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of Agriculture and Agri-Foods Canada (AAFC) requires architectural consulting services to review a decade-old needs study and determine the best course of action for today and beyond for the Charlottetown Research and Development Center (CRDC).
